bestMatch.name: Samsung Galaxy S23 5G
bestMatch.why: The Galaxy S23 is the most balanced flagship in this price range. It features the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 for Galaxy, which provides top-tier performance for daily use and gaming, paired with a versatile triple-camera system that excels in both photography and video.
pros: Excellent triple camera setup with 3x optical zoom
cons: Small screen might not suit everyone

alternatives.name: Google Pixel 8
alternatives.reason: Best choice for users who prioritize still photography and AI-driven camera features over raw processing power.

alternatives.name: OnePlus 12R
alternatives.reason: Offers superior battery life, faster charging, and a better display if you are willing to sacrifice a dedicated telephoto lens.

summary: For a budget of 60,000, the Samsung Galaxy S23 is the best all-rounder. It delivers a true flagship experience with a high-performance chipset and a professional-grade camera system that outperforms most mid-range alternatives in low light and zoom capabilities.
